content.prompt: Which of the following terms best describes this species?

choices.label: A keystone species, because it is carnivorous.
A generalist species, because it is advantaged in changing habitats.
An invasive species, because it competes with other plants for water and sunlight.
A specialist species, because it thrives only in soils with low \(pH\) and nutrient levels.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
